and he had some work to do. He was going to originally, um, fly me in his jet, but something happened with work and it just worked out better, so he paid for my ticket and then, because he was, he was supposed to be in New York when I went there, I was supposed to stay at his home but like I said he had to use his plane to go somewhere else unexpectedly. So I stayed with um, my boyfriend's family while I was up there. But while I was up there he bought me like, four hundred dollar front row seats to Phantom of the Opera. Like he, he set it up real nice. He gave me money, paid for my plane ticket, he paid for everything.
Everything.

DETECTIVE:
Okay. Have you ever been on his plane?

No, I've seen it though, I've been to the airport and I've seen it. It has a JE, Julia Echo - um sorry, that's like, I just remember that's what he told me it meant. It's a black plane, there's a black one and then there's like, I forget what the other one was like. I saw that one, the other one from afar. He has a black plane and then another plane.

DETECTIVE:
Okay. Has he tried to contact you recently, or

Yeah, I could call him today and be like I need - like

DETECTIVE:
//No, but I'm talking about recently like within the past couple of weeks. Like from the beginning of -

//Yeah, yeah. Definitely. Um, but only, only through email and my responses have been - I haven't responded, um, recently since I was contacted before but um the last two contacts I had with him was before I moved here, um, which I moved here on August 1st. Sometime before I moved here I told him or I wrote in an email that somebody mysteriously - do you need to stop?

DETECTIVE:
No.

I told him that somebody mysteriously called my house and told my parents, excuse me and told my parents um, what I did with him, and I just was like, I made it seem like somebody called and ratted me out to my mom and dad. And I was like I can't, you know, work for you as of right now, um, blah blah blah. But at that point, I mean, I don't, I didn't want to work for him, I just didn't want to burn my bridge, if you catch my drift. Um, so I just told him that I got ratted out, and then he answered, or actually it's
